title: #76 - Hotline Edition: What to Do When You Want to Marry, But You Practice Different Religions
description:
It’s another edition of the Matchmaker Hotline! You’ve got questions, and Maria has answers! If you want to talk to Maria on an upcoming episode, be sure to follow her on Instagram to find out when the hotline will open again! http://instagram.com/matchmakermaria

In today’s hotline...

  • He says he wants to find a way to date, but he’s seeing someone else. 
  • Our first update from a previous caller!
  • How do you manage different connections when they are not starting off at the same time?
  • I’m dating a man with a different religion. 

Want to join an upcoming Agape Intensive? 2022 dates just announced! http://agapeintensive.com

Follow Maria on Instagram to find out when the Matchmaker Hotline will be open to talk! http://instagram.com/matchmakermaria 

Follow Agape Match on Instagram at http://instagram.com/agapematch

Follow the podcast on Instagram at http://instagram.com/askamatchmaker
author: maria@agapematch.com (Maria Avgitidis)
